txt.en: 'If you have a moment, I have noticed that one of the mirror traps is not in working order. If you could take a closer look at the mirror trap, assess what has broken, and find a way to fix it, I would be most grateful, [placeholder].'
The broken mirror trap can be found at Shalakibal, in eastern Máttugard.\n\nYou should attempt to repair the broken mirror trap.
Parts for the mirror trap can be found scattered throughout Shalakibal.\n\nYou should search for parts to fix the broken mirror trap.
The broken mirror trap can be found at Shalakibal, in eastern Máttugard.\n\nYou should attempt to repair the broken mirror trap.
Continue repairing the broken mirror trap
The mirror trap is partially working!
The mirror trap is working again!
The broken mirror trap can be found at Shalakibal, in eastern Máttugard.\n\nYou should find and assess the broken mirror trap.
Master smith, Grámi Hornhelm, wants all of Máttugard's mirror traps in working order.
You have successfully repaired the broken mirror trap. Every mirror trap in Máttugard is now in working order. Master Smith, Grámi Hornhelm, is sure to be pleased.
The trap seems to be missing four different parts
